manipulators.description: Comma on nav layer for EN
Scroll back apps with esc on tk44 kb
Enter on 'n' key for tk44 kb

rules.description: Remap alpha keys for column key placement

manipulators.description: Swap m key to n for basic keyboards
Swap n key to b for basic keyboards

rules.description: Autoshift Alphabets only: Post alphabets if pressed alone, Capital alphas if held down
Autoshift Numbers only: Post number if pressed alone, shifted number row key if held down
